name: Ascendant Quest
description:
arrow keys to move

x to action

z to undo, r to restart

originally made to support hapa games' ascendant on kickstarter, the first stage is based on hapa games' logo: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/hapagames/ascendant-a-25d-roguelike-brawler-for-the-pc

five stages; change all white tiles black to complete a stage
